title: Neon Dragon's Embrace in the Floating Citadel
prompt: (masterpiece), (best quality), highly detailed cinematic vertical composition (9:16) of a bustling Fantasy Xianxia cyberpunk alleyway. The street is enclosed by towering traditional Chinese architecture blended with futuristic metallic elements, rising high into the misty sky where floating pagodas are visible. A massive, luminous digital dragon construct, glowing electric blue, spirals down the center of the alley, surrounded by dense steam rising from the wet, reflective pavement. Figures wearing dark, cybernetic-infused robes and armor, some carrying glowing swords, walk towards the foreground. Moody volumetric lighting, slight rain effect, atmospheric perspective, depth of field.
